title: Easy Alfredo Pasta
description: A quick and easy Alfredo pasta recipe that's perfect for a weeknight meal.  Can be customized with added protein like chicken.
instructions: Boil fettuccine for 8-10 minutes (or according to package directions).
Melt butter in a pan, add minced garlic.
Stir in heavy cream (or milk), parmesan cheese, salt, and pepper.
Add shredded chicken (if using).
Simmer until sauce thickens.
Add cooked pasta and toss to combine.
Garnish with parsley (optional).

title: Easy Chocolate Cake
instructions: Melt 1 cup butter and 1 cup semisweet chocolate together.
In a separate bowl, whisk 1 1/2 cups sugar, 1 cup flour, 1 cup cocoa powder, 1 tsp baking powder, and 1/2 tsp salt.
Add 1 cup buttermilk and 1 tsp vanilla extract to the melted chocolate.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, mixing until just combined.
Pour into a greased and floured 9x13 inch pan.
Bake at 350°F for 30-35 minutes.
Let cool completely before frosting.

title: Summer Salad
description: A simple and refreshing summer salad.
instructions: Chop cucumbers, tomatoes, red onion, and bell peppers. Crumble feta cheese on top. Drizzle with olive oil, red wine vinegar, salt, and pepper. Toss and enjoy!

title: Weekend Pancakes
description: Fluffy pancakes perfect for a weekend breakfast.
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.
In a separate bowl, whisk egg, milk, and melted butter.
Combine wet and dry ingredients; mix until just combined.
Heat a lightly oiled griddle over medium heat.
Pour batter onto the griddle in circles.
Cook until bubbles form and edges are set.
Flip and cook until golden brown.
Top with syrup, fruit, whipped cream.

title: Quick & Easy Ramen
description: A quick and easy ramen recipe with sautéed vegetables.
instructions: Bring a pot of water to a boil. Add ramen noodles and cook according to package directions.
While noodles cook, heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onion and garlic and sauté until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add carrots and mushrooms to the skillet and cook until tender-crisp, about 5-7 minutes.
Drain noodles and add them to the skillet with the vegetables.
Pour in ramen broth and add soy sauce to taste.
Garnish with green onions, sriracha, and a soft-boiled egg (if using). Serve immediately.

title: Scrambled Eggs
description: A simple recipe for delicious scrambled eggs.
instructions: Melt butter in a nonstick pan.
Crack in eggs and whisk.
Add milk, salt, pepper, and chives (if using).
Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until desired doneness.
Serve with toast, avocado, and fruit.

title: Seared Steak with Roasted Potatoes and Salad
description: A classic seared steak recipe, cooked to medium-rare and served with roasted potatoes and a side salad.
instructions: Pat steak dry
Season steak with salt, pepper, and garlic powder
Heat cast iron skillet over high heat
Sear steak for 2-3 minutes per side
Let steak rest for a few minutes
Slice and serve with roasted potatoes and a side salad

title: Homemade Tiramisu
description: A surprisingly easy homemade tiramisu recipe.
instructions: Soak ladyfingers in strong coffee.
Whisk together mascarpone cheese, sugar, and vanilla extract.
Layer ladyfingers in a dish, top with mascarpone mixture, and repeat.
Dust with cocoa powder.
Chill for at least 4 hours before serving.
